website_summaries.verdict: Premium, all-natural rose quartz handmade healing stone Gua Sha in a convenient three-pack.
pros: The rose quartz used to carve the Gua Sha board is carefully selected for its strength, beauty, and durability
All of the Gua Sha boards are made by hand
Dependable and safe enough to use on all skin types
The three different shapes lets you use them on any part of the body, including the face, neck, head, shoulders, and feet
cons: Several thought they were too thin, which resulted in breakage

customer_reviews.title: these are great. I'm only starting to learn about they technique ...
customer_reviews.text: I got two sets so I can work symmetrically on the face with the same tools at once. The cuts are not completely identical and the tools are not 100% perfectly polished and smooth. I was able to show the cut differences between the 2 sets but I couldn't photograph the texture discrepancies. The texture discrepancies are minor and with oil it should still work and should t be an issue. But for the price, these are great. I'm only starting to learn about they technique so I didn't want to really invest in something very pricey from the get go.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bisli

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tool after seeing videos and reading about Gua Sha. I am more than thrilled to have this in my beauty arsenal. It not only is useful for lymphatic drainage and improving texture and appearance of skin, but it feels so good. It's like giving yourself a massage. The tool itself is a beautiful rose quartz and is a nice size to hold in your hand. The grooves are smooth and it feels absolutely fabulous gliding across the skin. I love it so much that I ordered one for my mom as well.
customer_reviews.author: arentUlovely

customer_reviews.title: Great tools but no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The stones are great. I can see a difference in my face after only 2 months using the tool. Since I am new to gua sha, I was highly disappointed that there were no instructions or link to instructions. I contacted the seller. The video link they sent me to was a lady that looked like she had on a plastic mask. It was a joke. Fortunately there are a lot of other more beneficial videos on you tube.
customer_reviews.author: Lanita Ellison-Sene

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to my skincare practice. Gua sha is a powerful tool that yields results that seem impossible with stones......but they are!!! These stones are well made and beautiful. They came right on time and are a beautiful color. I have jade stones as well but these are just as beautiful. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, the pieces came well packaged in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the pieces came well packaged in a protective box with inserts that kept each piece secure and safe. The rose quartz is beautiful, each piece is well made, they feel sturdy and of good quality. A downloadable video is included to help you understand how to use this product. My experience with this company was very good, they seem to truly care that their product meets the customers standards. I would feel completely comfortable purchasing other products from them in the future. Thanks for being awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Only one tool. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The description on this product keeps changing. It was unclear previously and all reviews stated three tools were received. I received just one square tool from the seller Fast Shipper4U. For the price I would have bought a jade tool if it was clear this was no longer a set. The quality is nice and the tool is sturdy and smooth. Recommended if you are willing to pay this price for just one but I'm feeling very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Toni G

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to hold and it glides across the bottom of ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to break up the fascia to get rid of plantar fasciitis. It is very easy to hold and it glides across the bottom of my feet. I was stretching and icing before and after adding this to the routine, I can see that it is breaking up the fascia. Very glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: C. STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Have reasonable expectations, won't be disappointed. I'm enjoying them
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in the refrigerator, and they feel amazing around my sore, puffy eyes. I don't expect my eye bags to disappear from using these, but it feels wonderful on my face, a very relaxing routine. My favorite one is shaped perfectly to hold right under the eye, heaven! And I think it does help lower the swelling a bit. These tools, and a jade roller set, are the only things that helped my swollen eyes after crying from grief. As long as you don't expect some huge miracle change, just some soothing, relaxing relief from swollen eyes (and headaches, really helped that), I don't think you'd be disappointed with these. I'm certainly enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Crazygrandma

customer_reviews.title: These tools are beautifully made and a joy to use
customer_reviews.text: These tools are beautifully made and a joy to use. I will be buying another set as a gift for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: RoseWolf

customer_reviews.title: Love the rose quartz
customer_reviews.text: The pieces came in perfect and the packaging is great to store them away without risking damage. The pieces themselves are substantially thick. I love the rose quartz color. I almost want to leave the pieces out on my vanity but with 2 curious kids I don't want to risk them being damaged. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ending to a Facial
customer_reviews.text: My clients love these Gua Sha Boards! I usually use them after a anti aging treatment or a sensitive treatment. I apply them cold and commence to a relaxing facial massage right before I apply the final face mask. The sensation is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: love2read4ever

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Love these tools. They are exactly what I was looking for. The edges are very smooth and the the tool is a good thickness not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Koester

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed, scratched, and chipped craftsmanship!!!
customer_reviews.text: For ~$20 this item arrived without breaking. However, the craftsmanship on the tools I received were blemished, they had scuff marks and scratches on them. The edges were smooth but the flat surfaces had small chips in them. I am worried about possibly nicking myself on accident if the chipped surface further breaks down over time to become more sharp.
customer_reviews.author: jely763

customer_reviews.title: More effective than my past roller tools
customer_reviews.text: An absolute favorite for my skin care regime. I've noticed less bloating and acne when I use these. I also use them over sheet masks and when apply face lotion if I need to really have the product sink in.
customer_reviews.author: JennyinDC

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality and Super Exited to see how well they work
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to say how impressed I am with the packaging. The seller takes special care to protect the product in transit. The stones also came with an instruction booklet to help map out your pressure points and what motions to use on your face. I've been suffering with a head cold for the past few weeks so I couldn't wait to try these out. I applied some warm tea tree oil to my face and began massaging like the instructions shown. Needless to say they are helping with my drainage and tension in my head and sinuses. I'm excited to see what kind of results I will have over a period of time! Good seller, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for Gua-Sha
customer_reviews.text: First, the item itself is beautiful. It is almost like a piece of art - I almost ended up using it as a decoration for my treatment room. Second, the item was very well packaged and came with a bag to store the tool when not in use.. I was very pleased with this attention to detail. Third, the tool, and it is indeed a tool, is beautifully crafted for Gua-Sha. I am very pleased with this tool and I would strongly recommend this vendor for this Gua-Sha tool.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great face massage tools
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Well made, beautiful, easy to use, good sizes and shapes. The packaging is nice, too. Super quick delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bookish1

customer_reviews.title: Quality Personal Care
customer_reviews.text: I’ve enjoyed my Gua Sha experience with these pieces. They are high quality: nice weight, perfectly smoothed edges, durable, and also exactly as they appear in the photo. I do wish that the user manual was easier to access on the website or would just simply come as an insert with the actual materials.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holy Grail products. I have seen improvements in my jowls and wrinkles using these.
customer_reviews.author: Richard and Debra Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I just recently learned about Gua Sha while browsing on Amazon. The stones come beautifully packaged and protected in a nice box. They are good quality Rose Quartz and very smooth to the touch. I used them on a clean face with a little argan oil. I am just learning the technique but after the first use, I noticed my skin was smoother and my facial muscles were more relaxed. I would definitely recommend. Will be making this a regular part of my beauty routine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Therapeutic for Chronic Muscle Tightness
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this product! I can't believe how much tension I carry in my face muscles every day. After using these once, my neck would pop multiple times just from me changing position. I slept so deeply after using these because my muscles were finally relaxed. My skin also looks more vibrant and flushed with color, even into the next day. These will definitely be a part of my daily routine. They are highly therapeutic for chronic muscle tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I never discovered this, this is a must in a skin care, this is amazing, you definitely need this. I just cleaned my face, applied some serums and then I put some Argan oil on the top and massaged it with two of the stones (quartz) one at the time, and I my face feel amazing. Don't even think twice, just buy it, you won't regret it. PS. just for the record: nobody paid me to say this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Received the package on time and I love them! Have been using them almost every day ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the package on time and I love them! Have been using them almost every day for a week now and I really enjoy the shapes of the stones as it makes it easy to massage. I use them on my face and body. Great product and great price! Really enjoyed the customer service and follow up after I received the package. Would definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking to get a gua sha set. I can’t bring myself to spend the amount of money that they charge at specialty stores. Good thing I didn’t! This is nicely packaged and feels luxurious. I love that it came with a bag. Easy to put away and keep dirt off the gua sha tools. Update: the long gua sha is broken in half. My daughter dropped it not even 2 feet off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gamez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with no instructions. I'll look for some online, but prefer to have written ones.
customer_reviews.author: sun1

customer_reviews.title: the sizes of the gua sha tools were larger compared to other tools I have -- all in all both the size and feeling of the rose quartz felt wonderful in my hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and as soon as I opened the box, I saw how gorgeous this set was. The rose quartz evoked heartfulness, the sizes of the gua sha tools were larger compared to other tools I have -- all in all both the size and feeling of the rose quartz felt wonderful in my hand. I'm going to have to order a set for myself. My friend loved her gift. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mira M

customer_reviews.title: Initial results show promise
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a jade roller for a couple of months now and I love the results so I decided to up my skin routine by adding a rose quartz roller and found this instead! Initial results show that my skin is a lot firmer. I am hoping that with continuous and regular use, I will have less visible wrinkles especially on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Just what I expected! Be consistent and you’ll see results! My esthetician asked me a few weeks in what I was doing cause my skin looked great! ;) Also, truly great customer service! Had an issue with one of the tools, and Mary was so helpful and kind. If you’re looking for a good gua sha ser, this is the right one, from the right buyer ;)
customer_reviews.author: Liz Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: These work great but one did already break and shattered into a bunch of pieces so kinda upset how flimsy they are.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Amanda 🌸

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very effective
customer_reviews.text: Stones are absolutely beautiful. They came surrounded by reusable foam in a resuable box. However, they also come with a nice velvet bag for transporting which is great for me. I have noticed my wrinkles smoothed and way less tension in my jaw. I’m still learning some new teniques for sinus drainage.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu8517

customer_reviews.title: super smooth cant wait to try
customer_reviews.text: well worth the money, super smooth cant wait to try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I added them to my massage tools for IASTM but also lymph drainage and working around sensitive areas like the elbows, wrists, and ankles. The rose quartz is great for the cooling effects by placing in a bowl of ice water and using to prevent inflammation. Nice to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Janishasha

customer_reviews.title: Fabulousness
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Package arrived promptly and believe it or not, after only 2 days of application I see a major difference in my face and neck. The stones are beautiful and well-packaged to prevent breakage, the basic instructions are clear, and I am totally hooked on how great the process is working! You can use them on tight areas of your back, feet, legs etc too. Gua sha become a daily practice and this product is an excellent choice to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The rose quarts Gua Sha tools arrived quickly and in perfect condition. They have a nice feel, my clients love them. I've used them a few times and they were perfect. Soft, smooth, and cool to the touch. Did not feel too fragile, came in a nice box. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RavenWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: All 3 tools are great. I personally really just end up using the more square tool but it is nice to have the others. I was worried they may break on their way to me but they came In this box that had a spot for each tool and was packaged in this type of spongy foam material so they were secure and safe when they got to me. Great value for the price and arrived quickly. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have massaging my face every night for about a month and I look much younger. My face is lifted and my skin is bright and youthful. Amazing results. I will implement this as a part of my nightly routine for life.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product great company
customer_reviews.text: Very much high Quality material feels good to the touch cleans very well and keeps vibration to frequency well handled by the practitioner thank you for sharing your products on Amazon prime proud to be a customer
customer_reviews.author: becky moss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful it works and must have
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed with smooth surface and edges, love the color and packaging with storing fabric bag with a pocket for each. I use it to massage my neck as well and definitely better than fingers massage.
customer_reviews.author: Reflections

customer_reviews.title: high quality gua sha tools
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of gua sha in my business (I'm an acupuncturist), and have tried a few facial tools that came up short in one way or another. This set has all the shapes and edges I need to do a good job and my skin and face muscles have looked so much better since I started using this set. If you aren't sure which set to buy, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: AVLdays

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one, not the $100 one from Sephora
customer_reviews.text: I researched for quite a while on this product and am so glad I went with this affordable option instead of the $120 one on sephora. This one is gorgeous and works just as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Claus

customer_reviews.title: Pink Rose Quarts Massage Tools
customer_reviews.text: This set of rose Quarts scraping massage tools were priced well, are beautiful, sturdy and work as described. They work great for massage scraping plantar-fasciitis, and face massages. They clean really easy with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Rsmit8

customer_reviews.title: Morning ritual
customer_reviews.text: Awake. Splash water on my face. Pat dry. Use any of the quartz pieces to roll over my face muscles in all directions. Gentle way to awaken & massage my rested face muscles. Help to depuff any swolleness too. Nice product! Great value. Easy to pack & travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Soph4357

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Broke one the second I pulled it out. The other two have lasted and are amazing (The only in the middle.of the picture broke off on the nose part). It's very smooth and fits perfectly on face and in hands.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight and super smooth to work with!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packed. Quick delivery. And the product itself has a nice weight and smooth feeling to it. Shaped nicely and comfortable to hold and use. Comes with a little bag...but I would wrap them.in bubble wrap if you are going to carry them in it..as it may break if it hits against something hard or if you drop the bag. Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KathyC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These a truly beautiful!!! Real rose quartz just want I wanted:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and estetically nice
customer_reviews.text: This pink rose quartz Gua Sha set is beautiful. It's foam packaging is suitable for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great tools!
customer_reviews.text: These PEARLY Pink Rose Quartz tools are beautifully crafted and arrived safely in a well cushioned box. I've been using them for a few days, and do notice a difference in my skin. The tools are great for other ailing areas, like my ankle, to help increase bloodflow. Looking forward to using these tools and expanding my Gua Sha knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: RenaissanceEyez

customer_reviews.title: Best Looking Neck Ever
customer_reviews.text: Super product. Carefully wrapped for transport. These “sticks” are amazing. The scraping really has rebuilt collagen and has smoothed out wrinkles. My neck looks toned and tight. Jawline more prominent. I liked these so much I bought a set for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: BP001

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous, sturdy, and smooth. This craftsmanship at such a reasonable price was honestly a pleasant surprise! I couldn't be happier with my purchase and will likely be buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set! Love these, have been using all 3, came with a nice black bag for traveling & I saved part of the packaging that keeps them separated for taking them from room to room! I’m glad I bought this set!
customer_reviews.author: Pj Chazz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. It came with 3 pieces that were of a medium thickness, not flimsy or easy to break. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent materials (rose quartz). Very well crafted. Comfortable to use. Came in very secure packaging and were completely intact. I use with patients and they love them!
customer_reviews.author: Suburbetch

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I broke one within 24 hours. My fault lol, so be warned they cant take a fall. But I love the other two, so smooth
customer_reviews.author: Cathy E.

customer_reviews.title: Must have Beauty Tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that works very well in sculpting your face and helping lymphatic drainages. I highly recommend. A must have in your skin care routine
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: These came intact and feel wonderful in your hands, Looking forward to using them!
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I use it with Mirah Skin Oil and my skin feels excellent. The pressure point massage is uplifting. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G Hummeldorf

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: By relaxing and invigorating the muscles and fascia your result is a more vibrant healthy glow and a lessening of your harsher lines. Order from my Shop enidwellness.skincaretherapy.net :)
customer_reviews.author: Enid Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Item broke in the freezer and I always put them in the freezer. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My package came early, and I'm in love with them!! Looks just like image, comes with the cuter pouch for safe traveling/ storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: If you know how to use them and know what they are you will love them
customer_reviews.author: Michael LaFayette

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality rose quartz especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am new to gua sha so I can't review on that aspect, But I do know crystals very well! These are great quality rose quartz especially for the price. If you are looking for good quality crystal tools for gua sha these would be it!
customer_reviews.author: agentred

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I'm not so sure if I am getting any health benefits, but it is so relaxing. Especially since the stone gets really cold. It feels nice on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: GuanXiong Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the box it comes with. Definitely Save it to store your tools.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Item as described.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. After about a full year of use I dropped one and it shattered.
customer_reviews.author: erika

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safely in a box with foam. Look exactly as pictured, smooth, pretty color. My physical therapist first tried graston technique and mild gua sha while helping me with scar tissue from an injury, and it worked so well I went and got this set for myself to continue to use at home. Very happy, works well
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love the effect I get from using these. Be very careful with them. I dropped the long one in the sink, it only fell an inch or two, but it was enough to break it in half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set many times and I still love it. Perfect for toning the face.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Great set of guasha tools
customer_reviews.text: I love using this product. It’s a great guasha set for a reasonable price. It comes with three different sizes of real rose quartz tools. I started doing guasha with a plastic tool I found at the dollar store and this one makes all the difference. It’s heavy and moves smoothly across the skin. . I normally use this in the am and pm with some facial oil and do it very gently. If your skin is red as your doing this you are pressing to hard. It came very neatly packaged and with a small guide to teach you about guasha and pressure points.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: Broke into pieces
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked and placed them in the provided pouch. Unfortunately the pouch fell from the dining room table to the hardwood floor and broke into pieces. Very disappointed not able to use the product to provide any review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beauty product!
customer_reviews.text: Really wonderful product, very pretty packaging. I received it on time in excellent condition. I’d like to thank the seller for doing a great job as well in following up to ensure that I received the product. Works great and I notice a change right away!
customer_reviews.author: ts

customer_reviews.title: Quality not great
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but cheap. Broke in half an hour after it was opened when placed on a glass table. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Clements

customer_reviews.title: great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: great quality and price. Paid much more than this for an american brand and this kit has 2 more tools plus better quality.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I just used the pink quartz gua sha product yesterday for the first time and I’m in love !!! Goodbye roller
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality product. I love these things. I've been watching videos to guide me on how to use them properly and it's to nice! Really enjoy these for my skincare routine.
customer_reviews.author: deelynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: These Gua Sha are beautiful and high quality. They are a bit fragile but that comes with the type of stone. The edges are smooth and the weight is perfect especially when compared to other materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jazma Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The packaging that it came in was great. It made sure that nothing would break during the transport. I also like the feel. It was soft and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: One if the item quartz broke within the first week. They are very delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Lifting without surgery
customer_reviews.text: I also use it for lymphatic drainage and works amazing, I keep it in the freezer and do the massage every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinology

customer_reviews.title: LOVE< LOVE<LOVE!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Rosejoice Pink Rose Quartz Gua Sha Boards. All three tools are beautifully made and really give the most wonderful and relaxing facial massage especially for lymphatic drainage of the face! The quartz is beautiful and feel just amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Puppylove

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: One of the three stones I received was broken and scratched, had to return it since it was not smooth to use on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These stones seem to work quite well. They are comfortable to hold and easy to use on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but if you drop them they will ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but if you drop them they will break. As does all quartz and jade gun sha.
customer_reviews.author: johnny law

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good price for the product. The product itself was very nice and arrived undamaged. These stones are not hard to use but you do need to get use to it and find out what is best for you. Overall, it's a great purchase and will recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest for more than my wife says how much she enjoys them and so far have been one of her favorite birthday presents
customer_reviews.author: Jason Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Each piece is beautiful, smooth, and easy to use. I like the three-compartment, soft bag it comes in so it can be gently folded for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirl3

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rose Quartz
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Rose Quartz Qua Sha art. This is new to me, but I found lots of YouTube videos on the use of Qua Sha.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: They’re fun!
customer_reviews.text: Break easily this is my fourth set one false move and your heart is broke
customer_reviews.author: Steven Choi

customer_reviews.title: Great facial massage!
customer_reviews.text: Great facial massage! Video was very helpful! Love the packaging and makes it easy for travel
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: High-quality & great value
customer_reviews.text: This gua sha board feels high-quality, thick and substantial, with smooth rounded edges all around. It's exactly what I was looking for and at a great price. It arrived packaged securely and with a little drawstring storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Werner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Great tools.
customer_reviews.text: These gua sha tools are well-made. Great product. Arrived in secure shipping.
customer_reviews.author: mysterygaltx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and works great for TMJ
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for myself for facial massage. I also ended up using them for my husband’s TMJ. He uses these when it acts up and releases the muscle. These are great for both uses and we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Must use it to see results
customer_reviews.text: Now I just have to make sure I use it to see results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, natural stones in three distinct shapes. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, natural stones in three distinct shapes. They came in protective packaging set in foam in an attractive black box. I look forward to using a piece and sharing the others.
customer_reviews.author: imhr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stone gua sha. I love the weight and feel of these!
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth and easy to use on the face.
customer_reviews.text: I use these tools for smoothing lines on the face. I can also use them to scrape the whole body.
customer_reviews.author: Neli U.

customer_reviews.title: NICE SET AT A GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if its the best quality rose quartz but I really like how i feels when i put them in the fridge. I feel packaging couldve been better; thankfully mine didnt arrive broken.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool to use
customer_reviews.text: Great for use at home or esthetics practice. Handle with care. Lovely to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality Gua Sha tools. I was very impressed with the boxing to make sure they made it through shipping. The tools are really good for facial massage and lymphatic drainage. These are fantastic. Worth every penny! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel great, however one of my pieces came broken and there are shards in the box. Super sad about that but I plan on returning it and repurchasing because I really want to try these out.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Massages & de-puffs face
customer_reviews.text: I use the rose quartz around 2- 3 times a week. I find when I do use it, my face is less puffy the next day. It also just feels really good, while I'm using it to massage my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rosejoice Pink Rose Quartz Gua Sha Board-Therapeutic Relief and Skin Renewal -Premium All Natural Handmade Healing Stone Gua Sha Scraping Facial Massage Tools (3 Packs)
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Combo| Size:Pack of 3

Bit of facial massage goes a long way 

You hold so much tension in your face. I naturally seem to frown a lot so easing the tension above my brows and temples instantly lifts and opens my face. It's not just a cosmetic thing either, relieving that tension and the sensation of a loving physical touch to the face works instant wonders for your emotional wellbeing. 

By increasing movement through Guasha massage, the skin is able to naturally clear blockages that lead to acne, Rosacea, puffiness, dark circles, fine lines and wrinkles and overall strengthening the immunity of the skin. This treatment is so incredible and relaxing as well, The results impress you every time. you won’t want it to end. 

Features：

· Easy to use and effective for all skin types

· Very portable - use it whenever, wherever

· Anti-aging and anti-wrinkling

· reduces dark under eye circles and puffiness in the face and around the eyes

· Helps in lymphatic drainage

What Amazon Customers Are Saying 

"An absolute favorite for my skin care regime. I've noticed less bloating and acne when I use these. I also use them over sheet masks and when apply face lotion if I need to really have the product sink in." 

"It not only is useful for lymphatic drainage and improving texture and appearance of skin, but it feels so good. It's like giving yourself a massage. I love it so much that I ordered one for my mom as well." 

"My clients love these Gua Sha Boards! I usually use them after a anti aging treatment or a sensitive treatment. I apply them cold and commence to a relaxing facial massage right before I apply the final face mask. The sensation is AMAZING!" 

Want to Try It for Yourself? 

Add to your cart now to take advantage of this limited time sale price before it ends with Risk-Free
feature_bullets: MAGICAL HEALING STONE:Rose Quartz Facial Gua Sha Scraping Massage Tools help to ease tension, stress, and anxiety, promoting feelings of well-being. It improves circulation and skin tone, reduces puffiness, and smooths the look of fine lines and wrinkles. The healing stone promotes lymphatic drainage to help eliminate toxins and enhances the application of creams, serums, and oils. Bonus Professional Ebook

WHAT CUSTOMER ARE SAYING："I wake up with a puffy face most mornings, so I wanted to create a tool that could quickly help stimulate circulation and reduce puffiness. I love to use this together with my Noni Glow Face Oil—it helps the oil absorb deeper into the skin while also increasing blood flow and promoting collagen production. I’m obsessed!"

PERFECT BEAUTY GIFT-The rose quartz used to carve our Gua Sha board is carefully selected for its strength, beauty and durability. And that the different shape of those lets you use them on any part of the face.Perfect for the client looking for a gentle, natural, and non-invasive tool to enhance their skincare routine, Gua Sha tools are historically used in traditional Eastern treatments for long-term skin benefits.

100% NATURAL PINK ROSE QUARTZ：Hand-carved out of all natural rose quartz stone and shaped with round edges that glide smooth across the skin,All of our Gua Sha boards are made by hand in order to ensure you are provided with a massage tool that is dependable and safe enough to use on all skin types.A good Valentine’s day Gift for Wife or Girlfriend.

90-DAY MONEY BACK：Your satisfaction means everything to us.We are confident you'll love our Gua Sha Tools .If you're not 100% happy with your purchase within 90 days, let us know and we'll refund your entire purchase price.
